Class PlaygroundComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • Component<javafx.scene.layout.HBox>
      • PlaygroundComponent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LevelPage.BgImageComponent, LevelPage.FgImageComponent

    public class PlaygroundComponent
extends Component<javafx.scene.layout.HBox>
    Component representing the playground in the level page.
